Scene:
The Curio Shop at Uchihonmachi
(Uchihonmachi dōguya / 内本町道具屋)

Play: The Summer Festival at Naniwa (夏祭浪花鑑)

Production: May 1976

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Matsukadayū (豊竹松香大夫)

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seitomo II (鶴澤清友 (二))

Tsuruzawa Dōhachi II (see also Tsuruzawa Tokutarō) (鶴沢道八 (二))
